trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory Authentication Protocols
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Authentication Protocols

trans-unit.source: An overview of the authentication protocols supported by Azure Active Directory (AD)
trans-unit.target: An overview of the authentication protocols supported by Azure Active Directory (AD)

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory Authentication Protocols
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Authentication Protocols

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) supports several of the most widely used authentication and authorization protocols.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) supports several of the most widely used authentication and authorization protocols.

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section describe the supported protocols and their implementation in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section describe the supported protocols and their implementation in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: The topics included a review of supported claim types, an introduction to the use of federation metadata, detailed OAuth 2.0.
trans-unit.target: The topics included a review of supported claim types, an introduction to the use of federation metadata, detailed OAuth 2.0.

trans-unit.source: and SAML 2.0 protocol reference documentation, and a troubleshooting section.
trans-unit.target: and SAML 2.0 protocol reference documentation, and a troubleshooting section.

trans-unit.source: Authentication Protocols Articles and Reference
trans-unit.target: Authentication Protocols Articles and Reference

trans-unit.source: [Important Information About Signing Key Rollover in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn641920.aspx) – Learn about Azure AD’s signing key rollover cadence, changes you can make to update the key automatically, and discussion for how to update the most common application scenarios.
trans-unit.target: [Important Information About Signing Key Rollover in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn641920.aspx) – Learn about Azure AD’s signing key rollover cadence, changes you can make to update the key automatically, and discussion for how to update the most common application scenarios.

trans-unit.source: [Supported Token and Claim Types](active-directory-token-and-claims.md) - Learn about the claims in the tokens that Azure AD issue.
trans-unit.target: [Supported Token and Claim Types](active-directory-token-and-claims.md) - Learn about the claims in the tokens that Azure AD issue.

trans-unit.source: [Federation Metadata](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn195592.aspx) - Learn how to find and interpret the metadata documents that Azure AD generates.
trans-unit.target: [Federation Metadata](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn195592.aspx) - Learn how to find and interpret the metadata documents that Azure AD generates.

trans-unit.source: [OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn645545.aspx) - Learn about the implementation of OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: [OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn645545.aspx) - Learn about the implementation of OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: [OpenID Connect 1.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn645541.aspx) - Learn how to use OAuth 2.0, an authorization protocol, for authentication.
trans-unit.target: [OpenID Connect 1.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn645541.aspx) - Learn how to use OAuth 2.0, an authorization protocol, for authentication.

trans-unit.source: [SAML Protocol Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn195591.aspx) - Learn about the Single Sign-On and Single Sign-out SAML profiles of Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: [SAML Protocol Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn195591.aspx) - Learn about the Single Sign-On and Single Sign-out SAML profiles of Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: [WS-Federation 1.2](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn903702.aspx) - Learn about WS-Federation 1.2 in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: [WS-Federation 1.2](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn903702.aspx) - Learn about WS-Federation 1.2 in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: [Troubleshooting Authentication Protocols](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn195584.aspx) - Learn how to prevent problems and interpret and resolve errors when using Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: [Troubleshooting Authentication Protocols](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn195584.aspx) - Learn how to prevent problems and interpret and resolve errors when using Azure AD.
